title: GotoTheBuilder
body:
"Thank you Dakhaas!"


[[ Dakhaas? |Dakhaas]] [[ Who are you calling Dakhaas? Achterlijke gladiool!|Dakhaas]]

title: Dakhaas
body:
"Oh don't make a fuss about it. It is just a term of endearment."

 [[Give hammer|Give hammer button]]

title: Give hammer button
body:
"Thanks! I'll need that later!
Here, take these blomme. Could you give them to Truus? 

I admire her deeds a lot and I heard they are her favourite."

 [[pick up daffodils|pick up daffodils button]]

title: pick up daffodils button
body:
Jan van den Doem's character sheet appears

Route to next location appears
